subject: Concussions
Baseball
lead_paragraph: A union official said the case of Ryan Church, the Mets’ right fielder, highlighted the challenge that concussions present, and how greater scrutiny of the injury could benefit future players.
snippet: A union official said the case of Ryan Church, the Mets’ right fielder, highlighted the challenge that concussions present, and how greater scrutiny of the injury could benefit future players.
